description: a nearly up to date version (this is 4.0.1-1, latrst is 4.1.03), looks feature complete, ought to be OK but on Pinebook and KDE, fonts are horrible, thin, almost unreadable against bright white background. could not see well enough to navigate the guI to change fonts colors etc. gah! uninstalled,
summary: terrib le looking, unreadable on Pinebook + Kde

description: I would like to than all the people that have contributed to this software program. I have been using it for about 10 years on multiple radios and PC's. It is quite stunning what signals it has been able to bring out of the noise. I have never seen such ability to pick up low signal to noise ratio signals.
Don't have to lug around the heavy laptop. Now running on HP Stream with plenty of power and interconnects. thanks

Excellent program for ham radio operators. It does exactly what it claims to do. Program fits the technical knowledge of ham radio operators, but may get negative reviews from CB'ers and others who are not familiar with the level of expertise and the methods it uses.
the version available here doesn't work well (buggy)
App is very small on a hi res laptop
was working fantastic, then ubuntu did upgrade, now nothing works

it stopped working in April. and now hangs my computer 
that I have to reboot to shut it down
I even tried formating my hard drive and reloading Ubuntu 20;04 and that didn't make any difference
still hangz my computer
quite amusing this package is qualified as an Internet tool.
Can't make it work on 64 bit Ubuntu 20.04 LTS, WEBSDR.org on Firefox.
summary: Not working on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS, Firefox, WebSdr.org

description:
the first distro in which I found JS8CALL WSJTX FLRIG FLDIGI etc. in the latest high current version. Unbelievable. as if it was made for amateur radio.
ok FLrig and Fldigi can also be found, but hopelessly outdated.
utilisé par la securité civile (fnrasec et adrasec)

Avec WSJT-x c'est mes logiciels de prédilection.
Dommage que la version sur les snap ne suit pas la version actuelle, j'aimerais bien intégrer cloudlog... J'espère que l'update des dépôts suivra bientôt :-).
73 de ON7KER
